thread.title: What was life like 50 years ago? (20 Photos)
thread.title_full: What was life like 50 years ago? (20 Photos)

author: Hendy
title: What was life like 50 years ago? (20 Photos)
text:
Kerplunk made its debut in 1967 along with Mega Bloks, and Talking G.I. Joe action figures. 7 
Lite Brite also made its debut. 8 
The Beatles released their iconic ‘Sgt. Pepper’s Lonely Hearts Club Band’ album. 9 
Rolling Stone began publication, selling 5,000 copies of their first issue. 10 
After failing to sell under previous names ‘The Aristocrat’ and ‘The Blue Ribbon Burger,’ The Big Mac was officially born, making its debut at a Uniontown, Pennsylvania restaurant. Advertisement
